title: The Quiet family
creator_contributor_role: Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT, production company
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
abstract: All is not what it seems in this animated horror story
description: This 2D tale of horror has an unexpected twist to it - all is not what it seems! An Addams type of family deals with the consequences of having their little darling make friends with the rest of the world. Mainly b&w with splashes of colour. Hand-drawn animation.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000490; RMIT AIM Collection 2005 = Take AIM 2005; Active; 2005
